imdb.plot outline: A teenage/young adult action adventure series about a young man finding his place in this world, while at the same time trying to build a relationship with his father and a brother he has never met. All the while navigating the rocky road of young love, new friends and learning to Kite Surf.
imdb.title: Making a Splash
